caption: The king poured something into a teacup and found the princess in the tower. The princess took the cup and drank from it. A man, a cat, and a white horse were hanging on a wall. A Pinocchio and a gingerbread man fell from the sky and rescued them. They arrived in a town under the night sky. A beautiful woman walked hand in hand with a handsome man, waving to the crowd. They danced in the town square. A gigantic gingerbread man appeared outside the city wall, and soldiers armed with weapons and large launchers attacked it. In the city, the red-dressed fairy continued to sing in front of the band. Pouring milk from above, they melted the giant gingerbread man.
